drow.io

Class Exporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • drow.io.Exporter

  • public class Exporter
extends java.lang.Object

    Exporter

    Class for handling the exporting of files.

    Author:
    Simon O'Neill

    • Method Detail

      • exportFile

        public void exportFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                       javax.swing.JFileChooser fileChooser)
        Exports the file, using the JFileChooser to determine the save location and file extension. The file extensions will dictate how the file is exported.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - The name of the file.
        fileChooser - - The JFileChooser to determine the save location and file extension.
